mapper.insert: insert into member_level (id, serialnumber, pserialnumber, bord) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serialnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pserialnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bord,jdbcType=TINYINT})
insert into member_level (serialnumber, pserialnumber, bord) values (#{serialnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pserialnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bord,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select id, serialnumber, pserialnumber, bord from member_level
select count(id) from member_level where pserialnumber=#{serialnumber} and bord=#{bord}
select pserialnumber from member_level where serialnumber=#{serialnumber} and bord=1
select serialnumber from member_level where pserialnumber=#{serialnumber} and bord=1
select m.id,m.name,m.serialnumber,m.createtime from member_level ml left join member m on (m.serialnumber=ml.serialnumber) where ml.pserialnumber=#{serialnumber} and ml.bord=1
